prefixIntro.title: 基础综合
prefixIntro.description: 包含描述感觉、人物关系、学科以及自然现象的基础词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 五彩斑斓的拼图，组成了丰富多彩的世界。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 10 h2 M14 10 h2' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='9' y1='15' x2='15' y2='15' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一张面无表情的脸，嘴巴呈直线，表示毫无兴趣。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 10 h2 M14 10 h2' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='9' y1='15' x2='15' y2='15' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 因为厌倦而眼神呆滞或翻白眼的样子。

sentences.en: I am bored with the job.
sentences.cn: 我对这份工作感到厌倦。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='6' r='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 8 v4' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M8 12 h8' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='8' y1='12' x2='8' y2='16' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='16' y1='12' x2='16' y2='16' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='8' cy='18' r='2' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='16' cy='18' r='2' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 家族树的分支，连接着同辈的亲属。

sentences.cn: 我有三个堂(表)兄弟姐妹。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 2 l3 7 h7 l-5 5 l2 7 l-7 -5 l-7 5 l2 -7 l-5 -5 h7 z' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一颗实心的星星，代表它是所有选项中被选中的、最好的那一个。

sentences.cn: 红色是我最喜欢的颜色。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='8' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M12 20 l2 4' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M10 24 l2 -4' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='10' cy='10' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><circle cx='14' cy='10' r='1' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M9 14 q 3 3 6 0' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个漂浮的气球或笑脸，代表轻松和快乐。

sentences.en: My father is a fun man.
We had a lot of fun at the party.
sentences.cn: 我们在派对上玩得很开心。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='3' fill='currentColor'/><path d='M8 8 l2 -2 M16 8 l-2 -2' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个小丑的红鼻子，让人觉得滑稽可笑。

sentences.en: It is funny that the man wears like this.
sentences.cn: 那个男人穿成这样真滑稽。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M2 20h20' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M4 20 L9 6 L12 14 L16 4 L22 20' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M9 6 L7 20' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.5'/>
words.imagery: 高耸的山峰和崎岖的地形，象征着对地球 (Geo) 面貌的记录与描绘 (Graphy)。

sentences.en: I want to be a geographer.
sentences.cn: 我想成为一名地理学家。

words.rootVisual: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns='http://www.w.org/2000/svg'><path d='M 4 12 a 8 8 0 1 1 8 8 M 12 20 l 6 1 M 12 20 l 4 -4' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/></svg>
words.imagery: 一个循环的箭头，表示不断重复、周而复始的行为。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M 2 20 L 22 20 M 4.5 16 A 2.5 2.5 0 1 0 9.5 16 A 2.5 2.5 0 1 0 4.5 16 Z M 9 18 h 6 l 5 -2 M 14 18 l 2 -4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round'/>
words.imagery: 联想一个人彻底“躺平”，双手枕在脑后，翘着二郎腿，把紧绷的神经向后（Re-）完全松开（Lax）。

sentences.en: You should learn to relax after a long time of work.
sentences.cn: 工作很久后你应该学会放松。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M2 18 q 5 -3 10 0 t 10 0' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='6' cy='6' r='3' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M6 6 l2 2 M6 6 l0 3 M6 6 l-2 2' stroke='currentColor' opacity='0.5'/>
words.imagery: 波浪线代表海水，圆圈代表太阳。

sentences.en: Lying on the beach is very relaxing.
Let's go to the beach this weekend.

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='4' width='16' height='16' rx='2' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='8' y1='8' x2='16' y2='8' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='8' y1='12' x2='16' y2='12' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='8' y1='16' x2='12' y2='16' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一本教科书或笔记本的页面，列出了要学习的项目。

sentences.en: There are eight subjects for us to learn this term.
sentences.cn: 这学期我们有八门科目要学。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M14.6 2.8c-1.8 2.5-6.6 8.3-6.6 12.2c0 3.9 3.1 7 7 7s7-3.1 7-7c0-3.9-5.5-10.4-7.4-12.2z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M6 7 l-3 3' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M4 13 l-2 2' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 剧烈运动时，一颗带有速度感的汗珠飞溅而出，代表身体在努力降温。

sentences.en: I sweat a lot in summer.
Running in the heat makes me sweat.
